name: Wormhole Maze
description:
Game developed for the Black and White Game Jam hosted by MYline Media 

Theme: Gravity or Theory of relativity. I decided to mix both.

In this game you'll control of a imperial transporte with permission to travel through a wormhole. Nothing you haven't done before but you'll find yourself in a maze of wormholes, stars, moons and black holes!

There's also a downloadable version of this game. Check out!

Keep in mind: 

This game was made in 2 days so please expect some bugs.

Play the downloadable game to a better version of the game.

If you're having any problems to pass a level comment down below.
